actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Ordered to be reported with an amendment favorably.
Committee on Environment and Public Works. Reported by Senator Jeffords under authority of the order of the Senate of 10/17/2002 with an amendment. With written report No. 107-327.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 744.

official_title: A bill to authorize a project for navigation, Chickamauga Lock and Dam, Tennessee.
subjects: Federal aid to water resources development

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army to carry out the Chickamauga Lock and Dam navigation project in Tennessee substantially in accordance with the plans and conditions described in the Report of the Chief of Engineers dated May 30, 2002. Requires 50 percent of the Project's construction costs to be paid from the general fund of the Treasury and 50 percent to be paid from the Inland Waterways Trust Fund.

titles.title: A bill to authorize a project for navigation, Chickamauga Lock and Dam, Tennessee.
